entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
